sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词均含"缺乏，不足"之意。
means: lack ： 普通用词，指部分或完全的不足。
want ： 指完全或短缺某物，侧重缺少之物是必需的东西。使用范围比lack窄些。
absence ： 指某物根本不存在或完全短缺，或某人虽存在，但未到现场。
shortage ： 指不足，但侧重达不到规定的，需要的或已知应有的数量。
scarcity ： 指产量不足或缺乏某物难以应付或满足需要。

sentence.Network_en: This scarcity is inevitable in less developed countries.
sentence.Network_cn: 这一匮乏在欠发达国家不可避免。

sentence.Network_en: Their price depended almost entirely on their scarcity.
sentence.Network_cn: 它们的价格几乎完全取决于它们的稀有程度。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 石油词汇英语翻译(S) ... scarceness 稀少；珍异 scarcity 缺乏 scare line 火炬管线.
商务英语词汇大全_外语教育网 ... purchasing power,buying power 购买力 scarcity 短缺 stagnation 停滞,萧条,不景气.
GRE词汇精选（核心词汇） ... scant 不足的，缺乏的 scarcity 不足，缺乏 scarf 围巾，披肩.
所谓稀缺( scarcity ) , 并不是指资源在绝对数量上的多寡, 而是指相对于人们无限多样, 不断上升的需要来说, 用以满足这些需要的.

entry.def: If there is a scarcity of something, there is not enough of it for the people who need it or want it.

auth_sentence.content: This helps farmers adapt to heat and water scarcity.
auth_sentence.res_content: This helps farmers adapt to heat and water scarcity.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: This helps farmers adapt to heat and water scarcity.

auth_sentence.content: I would have enjoyed an elaboration on carbon-scarcity notion.
auth_sentence.res_content: I would have enjoyed an elaboration on carbon-scarcity notion.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I would have enjoyed an elaboration on carbon-scarcity notion.

auth_sentence.content: Part of it is the simple issue of scarcity.
auth_sentence.res_content: Part of it is the simple issue of scarcity.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Part of it is the simple issue of scarcity.

sentences.en: The scarcity of skilled workers is worrying the government.
sentences.cn: 熟练工人的缺乏困扰着政府。
